articles.author: James Olley
articles.title: World Cup: FIFA president Infantino slams Europe's hypocrisy in astonishing speech - ESPN
articles.description: FIFA president Gianni Infantino has lashed out at what he described as "hypocrisy" and "racism" from countries moralising about the Qatar World Cup.
articles.content: FIFA president Gianni Infantino has lashed out at what he described as "hypocrisy" and "racism" from countries moralising about the Qatar World Cup and claimed Europe should "apologise for the next 3… [+6268 chars]

articles.title: 'Back to the moon and beyond' – Irish company is helping to put first European on lunar surface - Independent.ie
articles.description: An Irish company is helping put the first European on the moon in 2025.
articles.content:
An Irish company is helping put the first European on the moon in 2025.
